name: Enter DiMensional (A Lewd Twine Experience)
description:
It is the far-off future of 2000. Humanity has expanded into space, the brand-new Internet has made the ultimate escapism possible. At some undisclosed location, possibly the middle of the desert, possibly space itself (or perhaps both, who can really tell the difference?) a new hidden facility has been constructed in the pursuit of nostalgia--our precious childhoods. For only the small expense of signing your life away, now you can live out the rest of your hedonistic life anywhere.

Enter DiMensional.

Features:

Play as your own personal character in numerous strange, lewd realities with other adult NPCs. Heavy emphasis on age roleplay, but will feature many, many kinks.

Each reality has its own map with different locations to visit, people to meet, and lewd interactions.

Alpha 0.01 - Basically only the Introduction and Tutorial have been added to this version.
